publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2044 Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to Scottish Junior Cup Winners 2008, Bathgate Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Bathgate Thistle for winning football’s Scottish Junior Cup and Cumnock Juniors for making it an enthralling game; further congratulates both sets of players for the way they conducted themselves; recognises the warm welcome that Bathgate Thistle will receive from the people of Bathgate when they parade the cup at their Gala Day, and hopes this will be the first of many cup wins to come.

S3M-2044 Congratulations to Scottish Junior Cup Winners 2008, Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 3 June 2008) Jamie McGrigor*, Robin Harper*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jim Tolson*, Michael McMahon*, Trish Godman*
S3M-2044 Congratulations to Scottish Junior Cup Winners 2008, Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 3 June 2008) Ian McKee*, Claire Baker*, Iain Gray*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*

S3M-2044 Mary Mulligan: Congratulations to Scottish Junior Cup Winners 2008, Bathgate Thistle—That the Parliament congratulates Bathgate Thistle for winning football’s Scottish Junior Cup and Cumnock Juniors for making it an enthralling game; further congratulates both sets of players for the way they conducted themselves; recognises the warm welcome that Bathgate Thistle will receive from the people of Bathgate when they parade the cup at their Gala Day, and hopes this will be the first of many cup wins to come. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, Robin Harper, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Jim Tolson, Michael McMahon, Trish Godman, Ian McKee, Claire Baker, Iain Gray, Patricia Ferguson, Jackie Baillie, Bill Butler
S3M-2044 Congratulations to Scottish Junior Cup Winners 2008, Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 3 June 2008) Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-2044 Congratulations to Scottish Junior Cup Winners 2008, Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 3 June 2008) Jack McConnell*
